Full stack engineer with 10+ years of experience, currently working as Principal Engineer. I am passionate about solutions that benefit the whole team. I believe strongly in engineers having product involvement and the interest to help them make the best technical decisions for the business as a whole. I combine strong technical knowledge with proven architectural skills. I am always looking for my next challenge with new languages, ideas or processes.

    In 9 years at Hubble, I grew from a Product Engineer to a Principal Engineer. I have deepened my knowledge across the full stack, learning to work effectively in a fast-paced environment, while building team consensus around technical decisions and ensuring I work towards continuous personal development.

    I have led technical projects, mentored coworkers and been instrumental in architecting and delivering solutions to address various technical challenges across the platform. Recently I have led the architectural design for a solution to handle imports from multiple different external data sources to manage our inventory, reducing the time to add new host imports from a few weeks to just a few days. As Principal Engineer I have enabled the team to consistently work on important ops updates and maintenance without delaying feature delivery.

    For most of my time at Hubble I have been working with a tech team of 4-10 developers and at times across multiple teams. I regularly code across our stack, working to improve our current infrastructure, picking up tickets and developing new features.
